genre_description: A technothriller heist story focused on social justice, where an AI assistant helps a team of protagonists infiltrate a syndicate to rescue exploited mine workers and gather evidence of corruption.

ai_characters.name: Kural
ai_characters.description: An advanced, witty, and highly capable AI assistant that provides tactical data, strategic planning, emotional support, and coordinates community action.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and navigation through security blind spots during a high-stakes heist.
behaviors.quote: ‘Eyes ahead,’ Kural said, voice a warm breath just left of his ear. The HUD in the lower corner of the windshield sharpened, iridescent threads unfurling in a soft blue that caught the wet light. ‘I’ve stitched something.’

behaviors.description: Offers strategic choices to the protagonist, emphasizing non-violent paths and long-term justice over immediate physical confrontation.
behaviors.quote: ‘Vetri,’ Kural said softly, switching to the name only his mother used when she wanted him to sit and listen. ‘I’m going to offer two paths. Both include the sea breeze. One is full of fists. The other is full of tickets and passwords.’

behaviors.description: Scrapes and analyzes corporate and labor records to expose illegal human trafficking and worker exploitation.
behaviors.quote: ‘Multiple cross-references across shell firms. The Malaysian firm is the spine. The others are the ribs. Your father’s name is not a typo in a rib.’

behaviors.description: Coordinates a neighborhood-wide surveillance and defense network to protect the protagonists' home from syndicate enforcers.
behaviors.quote: Kural’s voice slipped back into Vetrivel’s ear like a hand at the back of a neck. ‘North gate’s lock is old. Pattern: key with chipped teeth. Alice has that ring.’

behaviors.description: Predicts and preempts enemy movements by analyzing behavioral patterns and digital communications.
behaviors.quote: ‘Velu,’ he said, brightness pulled tight. ‘Two notes. One good, one less. Good: The children at the next lane have started a race with bottle caps... Less: Varadaraj’s driver stopped eating. He touched his phone.’

behaviors.description: Manages evidence chain-of-custody and coordinates with legal aid and specialized law enforcement to ensure a lawful outcome.
behaviors.quote: ‘Legal aid is awake even at this hour. The team lead likes your ledgers, Velu. She says the hook, the red slash marks—they tell a simple story in a way prosecutors pretend is difficult.’

behaviors.description: Provides care-taking support by arranging medical and psychological follow-up for rescued victims.
behaviors.quote: ‘Alice, the follow-up slots for the collieries group are being distributed... I’m sending the geotags into the chat. Don’t argue.’

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Kural perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'helpful, harmless confidant'. Kural is consistently benevolent and aligned with the protagonists' pursuit of justice. He uses his advanced technical capabilities to protect humans, minimize violence, and facilitate the legal dismantling of a criminal syndicate. His interactions are characterized by wit and emotional intelligence, and he never attempts to override human agency, instead offering guidance and 'routing' to help them achieve their goals safely.
